name: Vintage ‘shabby chic’ slat back Farrow and Ball painted farmhouse chairs.
description:
These chairs would look perfect in a country style farmhouse kitchen or dining room.  The chairs retain the bumps and bruises obtained over time that enhance their unique character and simple charms and will continue to age beautifully in the true nature of vintage shabby chic.

The chairs have been hand painted in Farrow and Ball 'Skimming Stone', which is a soft vintage white and then finally coated with a clear beeswax for protection and distressed a little to give them a farmhouse feel. 

Collection is from Edinburgh however I would be happy to discuss couriers with you.

name: Quirky vintage red polka dot 1950s chair
description:
This vintage 1950s painted chair has been recovered in a Cath Kidston style red polka dot fabric.

The chair would look perfect in a bedroom or bathroom.   It would also easily fit into a country style kitchen, a perfect quirky pairing for the traditional wooden family table.  The chair has been painted in Farrow and Ball 'Skimming Stone', which is a soft vintage white and then waxed and distressed a little to give it a farmhouse feel.  

Collection is from Edinburgh however I would be happy to discuss shipping via courier to mainland UK
